By leveraging the transformative power of artificial intelligence, we empower businesses to innovate, adapt, and thrive in an ever-evolving digital landscape. Our solutions are designed to enable organizations to stay ahead of the curve, redefine possibilities, and unlock tomorrow's opportunities today.

AboutPage.title: About Go AI 247
AboutPage.intro: Founded in 2017 in Egypt, Go AI 247 is a pioneering Digital BPO company delivering world-class customer experience solutions through innovation and AI-driven excellence.
AboutPage.visionText: To be the leading digital BPO partner in the Middle East and beyond, transforming customer experiences with cutting-edge technology.
AboutPage.missionText: To provide innovative, scalable, and cost-effective solutions that empower our partners to achieve their business goals.
strengthsList: Expertise across 12 industries, managing over 2M monthly interactions with 97% quality score.
Three state-of-the-art facilities in Cairo with full redundancy and security.
Advanced AI-powered tools such as sentiment analysis, OCR, and predictive analytics.
Proven partnerships with 20+ global clients across multiple sectors.
AboutPage.storyText: Starting in 2017 with only three employees, Go AI 247 has grown into a powerhouse of over 800 professionals, operating across Egypt and the UAE, serving over 50 million customers globally.
techPoints: Enterprise-grade infrastructure with redundant fiber and microwave links ensuring 99.9% uptime.
AI and automation tools for OCR, speech-to-text, and data summarization.
ISO-27001 and GDPR compliance, backed by 24/7 CCTV, firewalls, and AES encryption.
valuePoints: Technology-driven solutions that enhance customer engagement.
Customized scalable services tailored to your business goals.

brand.intro: AI-driven software solutions that accelerate business growth. We craft robust frontends, scalable backends, and meaningful AI integrations—shipped with performance and polish.

About.title: About Us
About.intro: Welcome to GoAI247, your trusted partner in pioneering AI solutions tailored for the Middle East. Born from the success of GoChat247, GoAI247 was established to bridge the gap between global AI advancements and the unique needs of the region. We are committed to redefining the AI landscape by delivering innovative, localized, and impactful solutions that empower businesses to thrive in the digital age.
About.aboutText: GoAI247 is dedicated to delivering secure, localized AI solutions designed specifically for the GCC region. From mastering Arabic dialects to ensuring on-premises deployments, we combine innovation, cultural understanding, and cutting-edge technology to help businesses lead confidently in the AI era.
About.missionText: At GoAI247, our mission is to make artificial intelligence accessible, practical, and transformative for businesses across the Middle East. We strive to enhance regional competitiveness, foster innovation, and drive sustainable growth.
About.visionText: We envision a Middle East where AI is not just a tool but a cornerstone of innovation, collaboration, and growth. Our goal is to establish the region as a global hub for AI excellence and responsible technology adoption.
strengthsList: Regional Expertise: Deep understanding of GCC markets and cultural context.
Cutting-Edge Technology: Leveraging advanced AI research for impactful results.
Customer-Centric Approach: We design solutions around your business goals.
Sustainability and Ethics: Ensuring responsible, secure, and ethical AI deployment.
offerPoints: Localized AI Solutions: Tailored AI systems for the Middle East’s linguistic and cultural context.
Generative AI Tools: From sentiment analysis to advanced NLP, turning data into insight.
Industry Applications: AI for fintech, healthcare, e-commerce, and government.
AI Consulting & Integration: Expert guidance to integrate AI seamlessly into operations.
About.storyText: GoAI247 was born from a vision to transform the Middle East’s business landscape through AI. Originally part of GoChat247, it evolved into a dedicated AI powerhouse, driving innovation, efficiency, and excellence across industries.
techPoints: AI Solutions Tailored for the GCC: Secure, On-Premises, and Arabic Dialect Experts.
We revolutionize businesses through safe and localized AI innovation.
From data security to on-premises deployments, we ensure full control and compliance.
valuePoints: Partner with GoAI247 to harness the power of AI for transformation and growth.
Together, we can lead innovation and build a sustainable digital future for the Middle East.

Services.title: Our Services
Services.intro: We deliver intelligent and scalable AI-driven solutions that empower businesses to innovate, transform, and grow. From consulting to development, our expertise ensures your organization stays ahead of the curve.

servicesList.title: Consulting
servicesList.text: Our AI consulting service empowers organizations to innovate by building tailored AI labs and implementing scalable solutions while educating teams on AI fundamentals and advanced applications through expertise in generative AI and custom implementations.

servicesList.title: Tailoring
servicesList.text: We specialize in customizing AI technology to meet the unique needs of the GCC region, offering solutions tailored for Arabic dialects, local culture, and business practices, while ensuring on-premises security and compliance for seamless integration and innovation.

servicesList.title: Developing
servicesList.text: We design and develop complete concepts powered by generative AI, including training models tailored to your business needs, delivering innovative, scalable, and transformative solutions.

Services.processText: We partner with clients from idea to implementation, combining strategy, creativity, and technology to deliver measurable impact and sustainable innovation.
Services.ctaText: Whether you’re exploring AI adoption or ready to scale your innovation, our team is here to help you every step of the way.
